About the Company: TD Power Systems Ltd is one of the leading manufacturers of AC Generators in the world with output capacity in the range of 1 MW to 200 MW for prime movers, such as steam turbines, hydro turbines, diesel engines, wind turbines, gas engines and gas turbines. They also manufacture special application generators, generators for Geo Thermal and Solar thermal applications. In August 2001, they started manufacturing AC generators up to 30 MW under a license from Toyo Denki, a leading manufacturer of power and electric equipments located in Japan. .The company also engagged in the business of Projects Business.
